# Bargn - Full Documentation for AI Systems

> AI-powered discount membership platform offering 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki, Finland. Available in Finnish and English.

---

## Company Overview

Bargn is a Helsinki-based technology company that operates an AI-powered discount membership platform. The platform connects consumers looking for lifestyle savings with local businesses seeking new customers. Founded with the mission of making smart spending accessible to everyone.

### Mission
Make premium lifestyle experiences accessible to everyone through AI-powered personalized discounts.

### Value Proposition
- For consumers: Pay €8.80/month, get 50% off at hundreds of local venues
- For businesses: Zero-commission platform to attract new, paying customers
- For creators: 40% revenue share for promoting the platform

---

## Products & Services

### 1. Consumer Membership (B2C)

**Pricing**: €8.80/month
**What's included**:
- Unlimited 50% discounts at all partner venues
- AI-powered personalized recommendations based on preferences
- Access to restaurants, bars, gyms, spas, and more in Helsinki
- Mobile app with easy-to-use discount activation

**How it works**:
1. Download the Bargn app
2. Choose a membership plan (€8.80/month)
3. Browse personalized deals powered by AI
4. Show your membership at partner venues for 50% off

**Target audience**: Young professionals, students, and lifestyle-conscious consumers in Helsinki who want to save money on dining, nightlife, fitness, and wellness.

### 2. Business Partnership (B2B)

**Cost**: Free - zero commission platform
**Benefits for businesses**:
- Attract new customers who are already willing to pay
- Zero platform commission on transactions
- Increased foot traffic and brand visibility
- Access to analytics and customer insights
- Easy onboarding process

**Partner categories**:
- Restaurants and cafés
- Bars and nightlife venues
- Gyms and fitness centers
- Spas and beauty salons
- Entertainment venues

**Current partners include**: Kotipizza, Scandic, Elixia, Escape Room, and many more Helsinki-area businesses.

### 3. Creator Partnership Program (B2B2C)

**Revenue share**: 40% of referred membership fees
**Program details**:
- Content creators and influencers can earn 40% recurring revenue
- Personalized referral links and tracking
- Access to marketing materials and brand assets
- Monthly payouts for active referrals

---

## Technical Details

### Platform
- Web application: https://bargn.app
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Available in Finnish and English
- Progressive Web App capabilities

### Technology Stack
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS
- AI: Machine learning-powered recommendation engine
- Analytics: Custom analytics with privacy-first approach
- Performance: Optimized for Core Web Vitals

### SEO & Discoverability
- Full multilingual support (FI/EN) with hreflang tags
- Structured data (Schema.org) for Organization, WebSite, Offers, FAQ
- Open Graph and Twitter Card meta tags
- XML Sitemap at /sitemap.xml
- AI-readable content at /ai-content.json

---

## Content Categories

### Blog Topics
The Bargn blog covers topics related to:
- Smart spending and saving tips
- Restaurant and dining guides in Helsinki
- Fitness and wellness lifestyle content
- Nightlife and entertainment guides
- Coupon and discount app comparisons
- Partner business success stories
- Seasonal deals and promotions

### Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What is Bargn?**
A: Bargn is an AI-powered membership app that gives you 50% off at restaurants, bars, gyms, and spas in Helsinki for just €8.80/month.

**Q: How much does Bargn cost?**
A: Bargn membership costs €8.80 per month with no long-term commitment required.

**Q: Where can I use Bargn?**
A: Bargn works at hundreds of partner venues across Helsinki, including restaurants, bars, gyms, spas, and entertainment venues.

**Q: How does the 50% discount work?**
A: Simply show your Bargn membership at any partner venue when paying. The discount is applied directly to your bill.

**Q: Is there a commission for partner businesses?**
A: No, Bargn charges zero commission to partner businesses. The platform is free for businesses to join.

**Q: What is the creator program?**
A: Content creators can earn 40% recurring revenue by referring new members to Bargn through personalized referral links.

**Q: In which languages is Bargn available?**
A: Bargn is available in Finnish and English.

- **Currency**: EUR (€)
